reviews.review_msg: This guy was significantly more competent for teaching the course.
Good prof, decent lectures and lecture notes. Overall a difficult course regardless. Most of the class did very poorly but it was graded on a curve.

Good professor. 
Yagiz makes it tough but Xue Bin balances it out well.
Assignments are a smidge tough but nothing a few hours can't solve.

This professor made up for the first part of the course (taught by Yagiz), he was an incredible professor who cared about making course content clear and understood by students. There were many examples that were directly related to the content in assignments. The assignments were fun and interesting, and the final exam was fair and relevant
